results.title: Subarachnoid haemorrhage and cerebral vasculopathy in a child with sickle cell anaemia.
results.text_hl: We present an adolescent with @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCA@@@ who developed @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ at the age of 13, and was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Inusa B, Casale M, Booth C, Lucas S. Subarachnoid haemorrhage and cerebral vasculopathy in a child with sickle cell anaemia. BMJ Case Rep. 2014 Oct 21;2014():. PMID: 25336550
